body: I saw [this suggestion](https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/issues/283) on Github but I haven't been able to find any official statement about federation. I'm sure there are plenty of people who would like to see this added for the reasons described in that Github issue. Although I have no experience with implementing federation, I am a developer who's willing to contribute to a branch that focuses on that.
body_html: I saw this suggestion on Github but I haven't been able to find any official statement about federation. I'm sure there are plenty of people who would like to see this added for the reasons described in that Github issue. Although I have no experience with implementing federation, I am a developer who's willing to contribute to a branch that focuses on that.
title: Are there any official plans to add federation to Ruqqus?

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
